other_title: Akuma no Hanayome - Ran no Kumikyoku (Japanese)
悪魔の花嫁　蘭の組曲 (Japanese)
悪魔（ディモス）の花嫁　「蘭の組曲」 (Japanese)
plot: Two siblings were happy on Mt. Olympus, until they fell in love. Deimo's sister Venus got imprisoned in the Swamp of Death. To save Venus's life, he must find a human reincarnation so that they can continue their love.
